response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe is tailor-made for your needs and expectations. This product holds immense value to us, but considering its significance to you, we are confident it will be a perfect fit for your endeavors.

We are offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This amount reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also our commitment to making it accessible to someone who appreciates its true worth.

Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We understand that decisions of this nature require careful consideration, and we are here to answer any questions or provide further details that might help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
